verses.padam: - Padam apAm|tvA|Emann|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|Odmann̍|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|Basmann̍|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|jyOti̍ṣi|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|aya̍nE|sAdayAmi|arṇavE|sada̍nE|sIda|samudrE|sada̍nE|sIda|salilE|sada̍nE|sIda|apAm|kṣayE̱|sIda|apAm|sadhi̍ṣi|sIda|apAm|tvA|sada̍nE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|sadhastha̍ iti# sadha - sthE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|purIṣE|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|yOnau̱̍ ( )|sAdayAmi|apAm|tvA|pAthasi|sAdayAmi|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ||1̍ (65)
verses.samhita: apAM tvEma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvOdma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvA Basma̱nth sAdayAmyapAM tvA jyOtiṣi̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA&yanE̍ sAdayAmyarṇavE sadanE̍ sIda samudrE sadanE̍ sIda salilE sadanE̍ sIdApAM kṣayE# sIdApAṃ sadhiṣi̍ sIdApAM tvA sadanE̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA# sadhasthE# sAdayAmyapAM tvA purIṣE̍ sAdayAmyapAM tvA yOnau# ( ) sAdayAmyapAM tvA pAthasi̍ sAdayAmi gAyatrI Canda-striṣṭup̍ CandO jagatI̍ CandO&nuṣṭup̍ Candaḥ̍ pa~gktiśCandaḥ||1̍

verses.padam: - Padam ayam|puraḥ|Buvaḥ|tasya̍|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|BauvAyanaḥ|vasantaḥ|prAṇAyanaḥ|gAyatrI|vAsantI|gAyatriyai|gAyatram|gAyatrAt|upAṃqśurityupa̍ - aṃqśuḥ|upAṃqśOrityupa-aṃqśOḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|trivRuta iti# tri - vRutaḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|rathantarAditi# rathaM - tarAt|vasiṣṭhaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ayam|dakṣiṇA|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|tasya|mana̍ḥ|vaiśvakarmaṇamiti̍# vaiśva - karmaṇam|grIṣmaḥ|mAnasaḥ|triṣṭuk|graiṣmI|triṣṭuBaḥ|aiḍam|aiḍAt|antaryAma̍ ityantaḥ̍ - yAmaḥ|antaryAmAdityantaḥ̍ - yAmAt|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|pa~jcadaśAditi# pa~jca-daśAt|bRuhat|bRuhataḥ|BaradvAjaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|manaḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ayaM purO Buvastasya# prAṇO BauvAyanO̍ vasantaḥ̍ prAṇAyanO̍ gAyatrI̍ vAsantI̍ gAyatriyai̍ gAyatraM̍ gAyatrAdu̍pAṃq̍ śurupAṃq̍ śOstrivRut trivRutO# rathantaraṃ rathantarAd-vasi̍ṣṭha̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA̱ prAṇaM gRuhṇAmi̍ prajAByO&yaM dakṣiṇA̍ viśvakarmA̍ tasya manO# vaiśvakarmaṇaM grIṣmO mAnasastriṣṭuggraiṣmI̍ triṣṭuBa# aiḍamaiḍA-dantaryAmO̱̍ &ntaryAmAt pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśAd-bRuhad-bRu̍hatO̍ BaradvAja̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA manO# - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ|ayam|paścAt|viśvavya̍cA̍ iti# viśva - vyacAḥ|tasya|cakṣu̍ḥ|vaiśvavyacasamiti̍# vaiśva - vyacasam|varq.ṣAṇi|cAkṣuṣAṇi̍|jaga̍tI|vArq.ṣI|jaga̍tyAḥ|Rukṣa̍mam|Rukṣa̍mAt|śukraḥ|śukrAt|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|saptadaśAditi# sapta-daśAt|vairUpam|vairUpAt|viśvAmitra̍ iti# viśva - mitraḥ|Ruṣiḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|cakṣuḥ|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|idam|uttarAdityu̍t̍ - tarAt|suvaḥ|tasya̍|śrOtra̱m|sauvam|śarat|śrautrI|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|śAradI|anuṣṭuBa ityanu̍ - stuBaḥ|svAram|svArAt|manthI|manthina̍ḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|EkaviṃqśAdityEka̍ - viṃqśAt|vairAjam|vairAjAt|jamadagniḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|3 (50)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇAmi prajAByO&yaM paścAd-viśvavyacAstasya̍ cakṣurvaiśvavyacasaM̍ ~Mvarq.ṣAṇi# cAkṣuṣAṇi jagatI̍ vArq.ṣI jagatyA̍ RukṣamamRukṣa̍mAcCukraḥ̍ śukrAth saptadaśaḥ̍ saptadaśAd-vai̍rUpaM̍ ~MvairUpAd-viśvAmi̍tra̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA cakṣurgRuhṇAmi̍ prajABya# idamuttarAth̍ suvastasya śrOtraṃ# sauvaṃ śaracCrautryanuṣṭup-CA̍radya̍nuṣṭuBa̍ḥ̍ svAraṅ svArAnmanthI manthina# Ekaviṃqśa EkaviṃqśAd̍ vairAjaM̍ ~MvairAjAjjamada̍gnirq.̍ Ruṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam tvayA̱|śrOtra̱m|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra-jAByaḥ|iyam|upari̍|matiḥ|tasyai̱|vAk|mAtI|hEmantaḥ|vAcyAyanaḥ|pa~gktiḥ|haimantI|pa~gktyai|nidhana̍vaditi̍# nidhana# - vat|nidhanavata̍ iti# nidhana# - vataḥ|Agrayaṇaḥ|AgrayaṇAt|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAviti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśau|triṇavatrayastriṃqśAByAmiti# triṇava - trayastriṃqśAByA̱m|śAkvararaivatE iti# śAkvara - raivatE|śAkvararaivatAByAmiti# śAkvara - raivatAByA̱m|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|Ruṣiḥ|prajApa̍tigRuhItayEti̍# prajApati̍ - gRuhItayA|tvayA̱|vAca̱m|gRuhṇAmi|prajABya iti# pra - jAByaḥ||4̍ (30) (tvayA manO-jamada̍gnirq.Ruṣi̍ḥ̍ prajApatigRuhItayA-triṃqśacca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: tvayA śrOtraM̍ gRuhṇAmi prajABya# iyamupari# matistasyai vA~gmAtI hEmantO̍ vA̱cyAyanaḥ pa~gktiṛhaimantI̍ paktyaiM nidhanavannidhana̍vata̍ Agrayaṇa A̱grayaṇAt triṇavatrayastriṃqśau̍ triṇavatrayastriṃqśAByAṃ̍# śAkvararaivatE śA̱kvararaivatAByA̱M ~Mviśvakarmaṛṣiḥ̍ prajApati̍ gRuhItayA tvayA vAcaM̍ gRuhṇAmi prajAByaḥ||4̍ (tvayA manO-jamada̍gnirq.Ruṣi̍ḥ̍ prajApatigRuhItayA-triṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAcI̱|diśAm|vasantaḥ|RutUnAm|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|brahma|dravi̍ṇam|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|pa~jcadaśava̍rtaniriti̍# pa~jcadaśa - vartaniḥ|tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|kRutam|ayA̍nAm|purOvAta̍ iti# puraḥ - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|sAna̍gaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|dakṣiṇA|diśAm|grIṣmaḥ|RutUnAm|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|kṣatram|dravi̍ṇam|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|saptadaśava̍rtaniriti̍# saptadaśa - vartaniḥ|dityavAḍiti# ditya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|trEtA̱|ayA̍nAm|dakṣiṇAdvAta̍ iti# dakṣiṇAt - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|sanAtana̍ iti# sanA - tanaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|pratIcI̱|diśAm|varq.ṣAḥ|RutUnAm|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|viṭ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAcI# diśAM ~Mvasanta̍ RutUnAmagnirdEvatA̍ brahma draviṇaM̍ trivRuth stOmaḥ sa u# pa~jcadaśavartani-stryavirvaya̍ḥ̍ kRutamayAnAM̍ purOvAtO vAtaḥ sAnaga̍ RuṣirdakṣiṇA̍ diśAM grIṣma RutUnAmindrO̍# dEvatA̱ kṣatraM draviṇaM̍ pa~jcadaśaḥ stOmaḥ sa u# saptadaśa vartani-rdi̍tyavAḍ-vayastrEtA&yA̍nAM̍ dakṣiṇAdvAtO vAtaḥ̍ sanAtana Ruṣiḥ̍ pratIcI# diśAM ~Mvarq.ṣA RutUnAM̍ ~MviśvE# dEvA dEvatA viḍ-[ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam draviṇam|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta-daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|Ekaviṃqśava̍rtanirityE̍kaviṃqśa̍ - vartaniḥ|trivathsa iti# tri-vathsaḥ|vayaḥ|dvAparaḥ|ayA̍nAm|paścAdvAta̍ iti# paścAt-vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|ahaBUna̍ḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|udI̍cI|diśAm|śarat|RutUnAm|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|dEvatA̱|puṣṭam|dravi̍ṇam|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|triṇavava̍rtaniriti̍# triṇava - vartaniḥ|turyavAḍiti# turya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|Askanda̍ ityA̱ - skandaḥ|ayAnAm|uttarAdvAta̍ ityuttarAt̍ - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|pratnaḥ|Ruṣi̍ḥ|Ud^^rdhvA|diśAm|hEmantaśiśirAviti̍# hEmanta - śiśirau|RutUnAm|bRuhaspatiḥ|dEvatA̱|varca̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|triṇava̍ iti tri# - navaḥ|stOmaḥ|saḥ|u|trayastriṃqśava̍rtaniriti̍# trayastriṃqśa - vartaniḥ|paṣṭhavAditi# paṣṭha - vAt|vayaḥ̍ ( )|aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUḥ|ayAnAm|viṣvagvAta̍ iti# viṣvak - vAtaḥ|vAtaḥ|suparṇa̍ iti# su - parṇaḥ|Ruṣiḥ|pitara̍ḥ|pitAmahAḥ|parE̱|ava̍rE|tE|naḥ|pAntu|tE|naḥ|avantu|asminn|brahmann̍|asminn|kṣatrE|asyAm|AśiṣItyA̱̍ - śiṣi|asyAm|purOdhAyAmiti̍# puraḥ - dhAyA̱m|asminn|karmann|asyAm|dEvahU̱tyAmiti̍# dEva-hUtyAm||6 (78) (viṭ - paṣṭhavAd̍ vayO - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: draviṇaṃ̍ saptadaśa stOmaḥ sa u# vEkaviṃq śavartani-strivathsO̍ vayO̱ dvAparO&yAnAM̍ paścAdvAtO vAtO&haBUna̍ RuṣirudIcI̍ diśAṃ śarad-RutUnAM̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ dEvatA# puṣṭaM draviṇamEkaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmaḥ sa u# triṇavavartani-sturyavAḍ̍ vaya# AskandO &yAnAmuttarAd-vAtO̍ vAtaḥ̍ pratna RuṣirUrddhvA̍ diśAṃ hEmantaśiśirAvRu̍tUnAM̍ bRuhaspatirdEvatA̍ varcO draviṇaM̍ triṇava stOmaḥ sa u# trayastriṃqśavartaniḥ̍ paṣṭhavAdvayO# ( ) &BiBUrayAnAM̍ ~MviṣvagvAtO vAtaḥ̍ suparṇa Ruṣiḥ̍ pitaraḥ̍ pitAmahAḥ parE&varE̍ tE naḥ̍ pAntu tE nO&vantvasmin̍ brahmannasmin̍ kṣatrE̱&syA-mAśiṣyasyAM purOdhAyA̍masmin̍ karmannasyAM̍ dEvahU̱tyAM||6 (viṭ - paṣṭhavAd̍ vayO - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dhruvakṣitIriti̍# dhruva - kṣitiḥ|dhruvayOniriti̍# dhruva-yOniḥ|dhruvA|asi|dhruvAm|yOni̱m|Eti|sIda|sAddhyA||uKya̍sya|kEtum|prathamam|purastA̱t|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||svE|dakṣE̱|dakṣa̍pitEti̍ dakṣa# - pitA|iha|sIda|dEvatrEti# dEva - trA|pRuthivI|bRuhatI|rarAṇA||svAsasthEti̍# su - AsasthA|tanuvA̱|samiti|viśasva|pitA|iva|Edhi|sUnavE̱|Eti̍|suśEvEti̍# su - śEvA̱|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||kulAyinI̱|vasu̍matIti̍ vasu# - matI|vayOdhA iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|rayim|naḥ|vad^^rdha|bahulam|suvIramiti# su - vIra̱m||7 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvakṣiti̍ -rdhruvayOni-rdhruvA&si̍# dhruvAM ~MyOnimA sIda̍ sAddhyA|uKyasya̍ kEtuM prathamaM̍ purastAdaśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||svE dakṣE dakṣapitEha̍ sIda̍ dEvatrA pRuthivI̍ bRuhatI̍ rarAṇA|svAsasthA̍ tanuvA saM ~Mviśasva̍ pitEvaidhi̍ sUnava A suśEvA&śvinA̱ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||kulAyinI vasumatI̍ vayOdhA rayiM nO# varddha bahulaṃ suvIra̱M|7

verses.padam: - Padam apEti|ama̍tim|durmatimiti̍# duḥ - matim|bAdhamAnA|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̱|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|ABajantItyA̱ - BajantI|suva̍ḥ|dhEhi|yaja̍mAnAya|pOṣa̱m|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||agnEḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi|dEvayAnIti̍# dEva - yAnI̱|tAm|tvA|viśvE̱|aBIti|gRuṇantu|dEvAḥ||stOma̍pRuṣṭhEti̍ stOma# - pRuṣṭhA|GRutavatIti# GRuta - vatI|iha|sIda|prajAvaditi# prajA - vat|asmE iti|dravi̍ṇA|Eti̍|yajasva|AśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||divaḥ|mUd^^rdhA|asi|pRuthivyAḥ|nABi̍ḥ|viṣṭaMBanIti̍# vi - staMBanI|diśAm|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍# - patnI|BuvanAnAm||8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: apAmatiM̍ durmatiM bAdhamAnA̍ rAyaspOṣE# yajñapatimABaja̍ntI̍ suvarddhEhi̍ yajamAnAya̍ pOṣamaśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||agnEḥ purIṣamasi̍ dEvayAnI tAM tvA viśvE# aBi gRuṇantu̍ dEvAḥ|stOmapRuṣṭhA̍ GRutavatIha̍ sIda̍ prajAvadasmE̍ draviṇA &&*yajasvAśvinA̱̍ &ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||divO mUrddhA&si# pRuthivyA nABirviṣṭaMBa̍nI̍ diśAmadhipatnI̍ BuvanAnAM|8̍

verses.padam: - Padam Urmiḥ|draPsaḥ|apAm|asi|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tE|Ruṣiḥ|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|RutuBirityRutu - Biḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|vidhABiriti# vi-dhABiḥ|sajUriti̍# sa-jUḥ|vasuBiriti̍ vasu-Biḥ|sajUriti̍# sa - jUḥ|rudraiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|Adityaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|dEvaiḥ|sajUriti# sa - jUḥ|dEvaiḥ|vayOnAdhairiti# vayaḥ - nAdhaiḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|vaiśvAnarAya|aśvinA̱|addhvaryU̍ iti|sAdayatAm|iha|tvA||prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi-anam|mE|pAhi|cakṣuḥ|mE|urvyA̍ ( )|vIti|BAhi|śrOtra̱m|mE|ślOkaya|apaḥ|pinva|Oṣa̍dhIḥ|jinva|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|pAhi|catuṣpAditi̍ catuḥ̍ - pAt|ava|divaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eti|Iraya||9̍ (67)
verses.samhita: UrmirdraPsO apAmasi̍ viśvakarmA̍ ta RuṣiraśvinA̱&ddhvaryU̍ sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||sajUṛRutuBiḥ̍ sajUrvidhABiḥ̍ sajUrvasuBiḥ̍ sajU rudraiḥ sajUrAdityaiḥ̍ sajUrviśvai̱rdEvaiḥ sajUrdEvaiḥ sajUrdEvairvayO-nAdhairagnayE̱̍ tvA vaiśvAnarAyAśvinA̱&ddhvaryU sAdayatAmiha̍ tvA̱||prAṇaM mE# pAhyapAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# pAhi cakṣurma̍ urvyA ( ) vi BAhi̍ śrOtraM̍ mE ślOkayApa-spinvauṣadhIrjinva̍ dvipAt pAhi̍ catuṣpAdava̍ divO vRuṣṭimEraya||9̍

verses.padam: - Padam tryaviriti# tri - aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|dityavAḍiti̍# ditya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Candaḥ|pa~jcA̍viriti̍ pa~jca-aviḥ|vaya̍ḥ|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|trivathsa̍ iti# tri - vathsaḥ|vayaḥ|uṣṇihA̱|Canda̍ḥ|turyavAḍiti̍# turya - vAṭ|vayaḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|paṣṭhavAditi̍# paṣṭha - vAt|vayaḥ|bRuhatI|Canda̍ḥ|ukṣA|vaya̍ḥ|satObRu̍hatIti̍# sataḥ - bRuhatI|Candaḥ|RuṣaBaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|kakut|Canda̍ḥ|dhEnuḥ|vaya̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|anaḍvAn|vaya̍ḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|bastaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|vivalamiti̍# vi - valam|Candaḥ|vRuṣṇiḥ|vaya̍ḥ|viśAlamiti̍# vi-śAlam|Candaḥ|puru̍ṣaḥ|vaya̍ḥ̍ ( )|tandram|Candaḥ|vyAGraḥ|vaya̍ḥ|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|Candaḥ|siṃqhaḥ|vaya̍ḥ|Cadiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|viṣṭaBaM̍ iti# vi - staBaMḥ|vayaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|kṣatram|vaya̍ḥ|maya̍ndam|Canda̍ḥ|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|vayaḥ|paramEṣṭhI|Canda̍ḥ|mUd^^rdhA|vaya̍ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|Candaḥ||10̍ (76) (puruṣO̍ vayaḥ - ṣaḍ viṃśatiśca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: tryavirvayastriṣṭup̍ CandO# dityavAḍ vayO# virAṭ Candaḥ pa~jcAvirvayO̍# gAyatrI CandastrivathsO̍ vaya# uṣṇihA Canda# sturyavAḍ vayO&nuṣṭup̍ Candaḥ̍ paṣṭhavAd vayO# bRuhatI Canda# ukṣA vayaḥ̍ satObRuhatI̍ Canda# RuṣaBO vayaḥ̍ kakucCandO# dhEnurvayO jagatI̍ CandO&naḍvAn.̍ vayaḥ̍ pa~gkti śCandO# bastO vayO# vivalaM CandO# vRuṣṇirvayO# viśAlaM Candaḥ puruṣO̍ vaya# ( ) standraM CandO̱ vyAGrO vayO&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ Candaḥ̍ siṃqhO vaya# śCadi śCandO# viṣṭaBOM ~MvayO&dhipati̍ śCandaḥ̍ kṣatraM ~MvayO mayandaM̍ CandO# viśvakarmA̍ vayaḥ̍ paramEṣṭhI CandO# mUrddhA vayaḥ̍ prajApati̍ śCandaḥ||10̍ (puruṣO̍ vayaḥ - ṣaḍ viṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|avyathamAnAm|iṣṭa̍kAm|dRuṃqhatam|yuvam||pRuṣṭhEna̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ -pRuthivI|antarikṣam|ca|vIti̍|bAdhatAm||viśvakarmEti̍# viśva - karmA|tvA|sAdayatu|antarikṣasya|pRuṣṭhE|vyaca̍svatIm|pratha̍svatIm|BAsva̍tIm|sUrimatImiti̍# sUri - matI̱m|Eti|yA|dyAm|BAsi̍|Eti̍|pRuthivIm|Eti̍|uru|antari̍kṣam|antari̍kṣam|yacCa|antari̍kṣam|dRuṃqha|antari̍kṣam|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viśva̍smai|prAṇAyEti̍# prA - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|udAnAyEtyu̍t̍ - anAya|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati - sthAyai̱|caritrAya|vAyuḥ|tvA|aBIti̍|pAtu|mahyA|svastyA|CardiṣA̱|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrA̱gnI avyathamAnAmiṣṭa̍kAM̍ dRuṃhataM ~MyuvaM|pRuṣṭhEna dyAvApRuthivI̍ antarikṣaM̍ ca vi bAdhatAM||viśvaka̍rmA̍ tvA sAdayatvantarikṣasya̍ pRuṣṭhE vyacasvatIM̍ prathasvatIM̍ BAsvatIṃ̍ sUrimatImA yA dyAM BAsyA pRuthivImOrva̍ntari̍kṣa-mantari̍kṣaM̍ ~MyacCAntarikṣaM̍ dRuṃhAntarikṣaM̍ mA hiṃsI̍ rviśvasmai̍ prAṇAyApAnAya̍# vyAnAyOdAnAya̍# pratiṣṭhAyai# caritrAya̍ vAyustvA&Bi pAtu̍ mahyA svastyA CardiṣA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam śantamEnEti̍ śaM - tamEna|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda||rAjñI̱|asi|prAcI̱|dik|virAḍiti̍# vi-rAṭ|asi|dakṣiṇA|dik|samrAḍiti# saM - rAṭ|asi|pratIcI̱|dik|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|asi|udIcI|dik|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍-patnI|asi|bRuhatI|dik|Ayu̍ḥ|mE|pAhi|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|mE|pAhi|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|pAhi|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|pAhi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|śrOtra̱m|mE|pAhi|mana̍ḥ|mE|jinva|vAca̱m|mE|pinva̍ ( )|AtmAna̱m|mE|pAhi|jyOtiḥ|mE|yacCa||12̍ (56)
verses.samhita: śantamEna̍ tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad-dhruvA̍ sIda||rAjñya̍si̍ prAcI dig-virAḍasi̍ dakṣiṇA diK samrAḍasi̍ pratIcI diK-svarAḍasyudIcI̍ digadhipatnyasi̍ bRuhatI digAyurmE̍ pAhi prAṇaM mE# pAhyapAnaM mE# pAhi vyAnaM mE# pAhi cakṣurmE̍ pAhi śrOtraM̍ mE pAhi manO# mE jinva vAcaM̍ mE pinvA ( ) &&tmAnaM̍ mE pAhi jyOtirmE̍ yacCa||12

verses.padam: - Padam mA|Candaḥ|pramEti̍# pra - mA|Candaḥ|pratimEti̍# prati-mA|Candaḥ|asrIviḥ|Canda̍ḥ|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|uṣṇihA̱|Canda̍ḥ|bRuhatI|Canda̍ḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Candaḥ|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|pRuthivI|Canda̍ḥ|antari̍kṣam|Canda̍ḥ|dyauḥ|Canda̍ḥ|samA̱ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇi|Canda̍ḥ|mana̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vAk|Canda̍ḥ|kRuṣiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|hira̍ṇyam|Canda̍ḥ|gauḥ|Canda̍ḥ|ajA|Canda̍ḥ|aśva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ||agniḥ|dEvatA̱|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mA Candaḥ̍ pramA Candaḥ̍ pratimA CandO̱&srIvi śCandaḥ̍ pa~gkti śCanda# uṣṇihA CandO# bRuhatI CandO&nuṣṭup̍ CandO# virAṭ CandO# gAyatrI Canda-striṣṭup̍ CandO jagatI̍ Candaḥ̍ pRuthivI CandO &ntarikṣaM̍ CandO dyau śCandaḥ samA śCandO nakṣatrAṇi̍ CandO mana śCandO vAk Candaḥ̍ kRuṣi śCandO hiraṇyaM̍ CandO gau śCandO &jA CandO &śva śCandaḥ||agnirdEvatA̍ - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam vAtaḥ|dEvatA̱|sUrya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|candramA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱|vasa̍vaḥ|dEvatA̱|rudrAḥ|dEvatA̱|AdityAḥ|dEvatA̱|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|maruta̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|varu̍ṇaḥ|dEvatA̱|mUd^^rdhA|asi|rAṭ|dhruvA|asi|dharuṇA̱|yantrI|asi|yami̍trI|iṣE|tvA|UrjE|tvA|kRuṣyai|tvA|kṣEmA̍ya|tvA|yantrI̱|rAṭ|dhruvA|asi|dhara̍ṇI|dhartrI|asi|dhari̍trI|Ayu̍ṣE|tvA̍ ( )|varcasE|tvA|Oja̍sE|tvA|balA̍ya|tvA||14̍
verses.samhita: vAtO# dEvatA sUryO# dEvatA# candramA# dEvatA vasavO̍ dEvatA# rudrA dEvatA# &&dityA dEvatA viśvE# dEvA dEvatA# marutO# dEvatA bRuhaspati# rdEvatEndrO# dEvatA varuṇO̍ dEvatA# mUrddhA&si rAḍ dhruvA&si# dharuṇA# yantryasi̍ yamitrIṣE̍ tvOrjE tvA# kRuṣyai tvA kṣEmAya̍ tvA yantrI rAḍ dhruvA&si dharaṇI̍ dhartryasi̍ dharitryAyuṣE̍ tvA ( ) varcasE̍ tvaujasE̍ tvA balAya̍ tvA||14

verses.padam: - Padam Aśuḥ|trivRuditi# tri-vRut|BAntaḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca-daśaḥ|vyOmEti̍ vi - Oma|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|pratU̱rtiriti pra-tUrtiḥ|aṣṭAdaśa ityaṣṭA-daśaḥ|tapa̍ḥ|navadaśa̍ iti# nava-daśaḥ|aBivarta ityaBi̍ - vartaḥ|saviṃqśa iti# sa - viṃqśaḥ|dharuṇaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|varcaḥ|dvAviṃqśaḥ|saBaMra̍ṇa̍ iti# saM - Baraṇaḥ|trayOviṃqśa̍ iti# trayaḥ - viṃqśaḥ|yOniḥ|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - viṃqśaḥ|garBA̱ḥ|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|Ojaḥ|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|kratuḥ|Ekatriṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - triṃqśaḥ|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|braddhnasya|viṣṭapa̱m|catustriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - triṃqśaḥ|nAkaḥ|ṣaṭtriṃqśa̍ iti# ṣaṭ - triṃqśaḥ|vivarta iti# vi - vartaḥ|aṣṭAcatvAriṃqśa ityaṣṭA-catvAriṃqśaḥ|dhartraḥ|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ||15 (37) (Aśuḥ - saptatriṃśat)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: AśustrivRud-BAntaḥ pa~jcadaśO̍ vyOma̍ saptadaśaḥ pratU̱rtiraṣṭAdaśa stapO# navadaśO# &Bivartaḥ saviṃqśO̍ dharuṇa# EkaviṃqśO varcO̱ dvAviṃqśaḥ saMBaraṇastrayOviṃqśO̍ yOniścaturviṃqśO̍ garBA̱ḥ pa~jcaviṃqśa Ojastriṇavaḥ̍ kraturEkatriṃqśaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA̍ trayastriṃqśO̍ braddhnasya# viṣṭapaM̍ catustriṃqśO nAkaḥ̍ ṣaṭtriṃqśO vivartO̱&ṣṭAcatvAriṃqśO̍ dhartraścatuṣṭOmaḥ||15̍ (Aśuḥ - saptatriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnEḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|dIkṣAyA̱ḥ|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|brahma|spRutam|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|stOmaḥ|indra̍sya|BAgaḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|kṣatram|spRutam|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|nRucakṣa̍sAmiti̍# nRu - cakṣasAm|BAgaḥ|asi|dhAtuḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|janitra̱m|spRutam|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|stOmaḥ|mitrasya̍|BAgaḥ|asi|varu̍ṇasya|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|divaḥ|vRuṣṭiḥ|vAtA̱ḥ|spRutAḥ|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|adi̍tyai|BAgaḥ|asi|pUṣṇaḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|Ojaḥ|spRutam|triṇava̍ iti# tri - navaḥ|stOmaḥ|vasU̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnErBAgO&si̍ dIkṣAyA AdhipatyaM̍ brahma# spRutaM trivRuth stOma indrasya̍ BAgO&si̍ viṣṇOrAdhipatyaM̍ kṣatraṅ spRutaM pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ stOmO# nRucakṣasAM̍ BAgO&si̍ dhAturAdhipatyaM̍ janitraṅ# spRutaṃ saptadaśaḥ̍ stOmO# mitrasya# BAgO&si̍ varuṇasyA&&dhi̍patyaM̍ divO vRuṣṭirvAtA̱ḥ spRutA Ekaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO&dityai̍ BAgO&si̍ pUṣṇa AdhipatyamOja̍ḥ̍ spRutaM triṇavaḥ̍ stOmO vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam rudrAṇA̱m|AdhipatyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|catuṣpAditi̍ catuḥ-pAt|spRutam|caturviṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ-viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|AdityAnA̱m|BAgaḥ|asi|marutA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|garBA̱ḥ|spRutAḥ|pa~jcaviṃqśa iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|BAgaḥ|asi|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|samIcI̱ḥ|diśaḥ|spRutAḥ|catuṣṭOma̍ iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ|stOmaḥ|yAvA̍nAm|BAgaḥ|asi|ayA̍vAnAm|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|spRutAḥ|catuścatvAriṃqśa iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|RuBUṇAm|BAgaḥ|asi|viśvE̍ṣAm|dEvAnA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍-patyam|BUtam|niśA̱ntamiti̍ ni - śAntam|spRutam|trayastriṃqśa iti# trayaḥ - triṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ||17̍ (46) (vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: rudrAṇAmAdhipatyaM̍ catuṣpAth̍ spRutaM caturviṃqśaḥ̍ stOma# AdityAnA̱M BAgO&si̍ marutAmAdhipatyaM̍ garBA̱ḥ spRutAḥ pa~jcaviṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO# dEvasya# saviturBAgO&si̍ bRuhaspatErAdhipatyaṃ̍ samIcIrdiśaḥ̍ spRutAścatuṣṭOmaḥ̍ stOmO yAvAnAM̍ BAgO̱&syayAvAnAmAdhi̍patyaM̍ prajAḥ spRutA-ścatu-ścatvAriṃqśaḥ̍ stOma# RuBUṇAM BAgO&si̍ viśvEṣAM̍ dEvAnAmAdhipatyaM̍ BUtaM niśA̱ntaṅ spRutaM trayastriṃqśaḥ̍ stOmaḥ||17̍ (vasUnAM̍ BAgO&si̍ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam EkayA|astuvata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|adhIyanta|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|tisRuBiriti# tisRu - Biḥ|astuvata|brahma|asRujyata|brahma̍ṇaḥ|pati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|AsIt|pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca-Biḥ|astuvata|BUtAni|asRujyanta|BUtAnA̱m|pati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptaBiriti# sapta - Biḥ|astuvata|saptarq.ṣaya iti# sapta - Ruṣayaḥ|asRujyanta|dhAtA|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|navaBiriti# nava - Biḥ|astuvata|pitaraḥ|asRujyanta|adi̍tiḥ|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍-patnI|AsIt|EkAdaśaBirityE̍kAdaśa̍ - Biḥ|astuvata|Rutavaḥ|asRujyanta|Artavaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|trayOdaśaBiriti# trayOdaśa - Biḥ|astuvata|mAsA̱ḥ|asRujyanta|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|18 (50)
verses.samhita: EkayA&stuvata̍ prajA adhIyanta̍ prajApatiradhi̍patirAsIt̍ tisRuBirastuvata̍ brahmAsRujyata̍ brahmaṇaspati-radhi̍patirAsIt̍ pa~jcaBirastuvata̍ BUtAnyasRujyanta̍ BUtAnAM patiradhipatirAsIth̍ saptaBirastuvata̍ saptarq.ṣayO&sRujyanta̍ dhAtA-dhipatirAsI-nnavaBi̍rastuvata̍ pitarO-&sRujyantA-&*di̍tiradhi̍patnyAsI-dEkAdaśaBi̍-rastuvatartavO̍&̍ sRujyantA- &&rtavO-&dhipati-rAsIt̍ trayOdaśaBi-rastuvata̍ mAsA# asRujyanta saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam AsIt|pa~jcadaśaBiriti# pa~jcadaśa -Biḥ|astuvata|kṣatram|asRujyata|indraḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptadaśaBiriti# saptadaśa-Biḥ|astuvata|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|navadaśaBiriti# navadaśa -Biḥ|astuvata|śUdrAryAviti# śUdra - aryau|asRujyEtAm|ahOrAtrE ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|adhipatnI̍ ityadhi-̍ patnI|AstAm|EkaviṃśatyEtyEka̍# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|EkaśaPA̍ ityEka# - śaPAḥ|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|varu̍ṇaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|trayOviṃśatyEti̍ trayaḥ-viṃqśatyA|astuvata|kṣudrAḥ|paśava̍ḥ|asRujyanta|pUṣA|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|pa~jcaviṃśatyEti̍ pa~jca# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|AraṇyAḥ|paśavaḥ|asRujyanta|vAyuḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|saptaviṃśatyEti̍# sapta - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|vIti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rAsIt pa~jcadaśaBirastuvata̍ kṣatramasRujyatEndrO̍ &dhipatirAsIth-saptadaśaBi̍rastuvata̍ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ bRuhaspatiradhipati-rAsInnavadaśaBi̍-rastuvata̍ śUdrAryAvasRujyEtAmahOrAtrE̍ adhipatnI̍ AstAmEkaviṃ̍ śatyA&stuvataikaśaPAḥ̍ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ varuṇO &dhipatirAsIt̍ trayOviṃśatyA&stuvata̍ kṣudrAḥ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ pUṣA &dhipatirAsIt̍ pa~jcaviṃśatyA̍ &stuvatA*&&raṇyAḥ paśavO&sRujyanta̍ vAyuradhipatirAsIth̍ saptaviṃśatyA&stuvata̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ vyai-̍ [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam EtAm|vasavaḥ|rudrAḥ|AdityAḥ|anu̍|vIti̍|Ayann|tEṣA̱m|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|AsIt|navaviṃśatyEti̍ nava# - viṃqśatyA|astuvata|vanaspatayaḥ|asRujyanta|sOma̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt|EkatriṃśatEtyE̍ka-triṃqśatA|astuvata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujyanta|yAvAnAm|ca|ayA̍vAnAm|ca|Adhi̍patyamityAdhi̍# - patyam|AsIt|trayastriṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ-triṃqśatA|astuvata|BUtAni̍|aśAmyann|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|paramEṣṭhI|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|AsIt||20 (35) (saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ rvi - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: -tAM ~MvasavO̍ rudrA AdityA̍ anu vyAyan̍ tEṣAmAdhipatyamAsI-nnava̍viṃ̍ śatyA&stuvata vanaspatayO&sRujyanta̍ sOmO &dhipatirAsI-dEka̍triṃśatA̍ &stuvata prajA asRujyanta̍ yAvAnAM̍ cAyAvAnAM̍ cA&&dhipatyamAsIt̍ trayastriṃśatA̍ &stuvata BUtAnyaśAmyan̍ prajApatiḥ̍ paramEṣṭhyadhipatirAsIt||20̍ (saM~MvathsarO&dhipati-̍ rvi - pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam iyam|Eva|sA|yA|prathamA|vyaucCaditi# vi - aucCat|antaḥ|asyAm|carati|praviṣṭEti̍ pra - viṣṭA||vadhUḥ|jajAna|navagaditi# nava - gat|janitrI|traya̍ḥ|EnAm|mahimAna̍ḥ|sacantE||Canda̍svatI̍ iti|uṣasA̱|pEpi̍śAnE̍ iti|samAnam|yOni̱m|anviti̍|sa~jcara̍ntI̍ iti# saM - carantI||sUrya̍patnI̍ iti sUrya# - patnI|vIti|carataḥ|prajAnatI̍ iti# pra-jAnatI|kEtum|kRuṇvAnE iti|ajarE̍ iti|BUri̍rEtasEti̍ BUri# - rEtasA||Rutasya|panthA̱m|anviti̍|tisraḥ|Eti̍|aguḥ|traya̍ḥ|GarmAsa̍ḥ|anviti̍|jyOti̍ṣA|Eti̍|aguḥ||prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|EkA̱|rakṣati|Urja̱m|EkA̱|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iyamEva sA yA prathamA̍ vyaucCadantarasyAM̍ carati̍ praviṣṭA|vadhUrja̍jAna̍ navagajjanitrI̍ traya# EnAM mahimAnaḥ̍ sacantE||CandasvatI̍ uṣasA pEpiśAnE̍ samAnaM ~MyOnimanu# sa~jcarantI|sUrya̍patnI̍ vi carataḥ̍ prajAnatI kEtuM kRuṇvAnE̍ ajara BUrirEtasA||Rutasya̍ panthAmanu# tisra A&gustrayO# GarmAsO anu jyOtiṣA&&guḥ|prajAmEkA̍ rakṣatyUrjamEkA̱ -[ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam vratam|EkA̱|rakṣati|dEvayUnAmiti# dEva - yUnAm||catuṣṭOma iti# catuḥ-stOmaḥ|aBavat|yA|turIyA̱|yajñasya|pakṣau|Ruṣayaḥ|Bava̍ntI||gAyatrIm|triṣṭuBa̱m|jaga̍tIm|anuṣṭuBamitya̍nu-stuBa̱m|bRuhat|arkam|yu~jjAnAḥ|suva̍ḥ|Eti̍|aBarann|idam||pa~jcaBiriti̍# pa~jca - Biḥ|dhAtA|vIti|dadhau|idam|yat|tAsA̱m|svasRU̱ḥ|ajanayat|pa~jca̍pa~jcEti̍ pa~jca# - pa~jca||tAsA̱m|u|yanti|prayavEṇEti# pra - yavEna|pa~jca̍|nAnA̱|rUpAṇi̍|krata̍vaḥ|vasA̍nAḥ||triṃqśat|svasA̍raḥ|upEti̍|yanti|niṣkRutamiti̍# niḥ - kRutam|samAnam|kEtum|pratimu~jcamAnA̍ iti# prati - mu~jcamAnAḥ||22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vratamEkA# rakṣati dEvayUnAM||catuṣṭOmO aBavadyA̍ turIyA# yajñasya# pakṣAvRuṣayO̍ BavantI|gAyatrIM̍ triṣṭuBaM jagatImanuṣṭuBa̍M̍ bRuhadarkaM ~Myu~jjAnAḥ̍ suvarA&BarannidaM||pa~jcaBi̍rddhAtA̍ vi dadhAvidaM̍ ~Myat tAsAṅq svasRUrajanayat̍ pa~jcapa~jca|tAsA̍mu̍ yanti prayavEṇa pa~jca nAnA# rUpAṇi kratavO̍ vasAnAḥ||triṃqśath̍ svasAra̍ upayanti̍ niṣkRutaṃ samAnaM̍ kEtuM pratimu~jcamA̍nAḥ|22̍

verses.padam: - Padam RutUn|tanvatE|kavayaḥ|prajAnatIriti̍# pra - jAnatIḥ|maddhyECandasa̍ iti maddhyE̱ - Candasaḥ|parIti|yanti|BAsva̍tIḥ||jyOti̍ṣmatI|pratIti̍|mu~jcatE|naBa̍ḥ|rAtrI̱|dEvI|sUrya̍sya|vratAni̍||vIti̍|paśyanti|paśava̍ḥ|jAya̍mAnAḥ|nAnA̍rUpA̍ iti nAnA̱ - rUpAḥ|mAtuḥ|asyAḥ|upastha ityupa - sthE||EkAṣṭakEtyEka-̍ aṣṭakA|tapasA|tapya̍mAnA|jajAna̍|garBa̱m|mahimAna̱m|indra̱m||tEna̍|dasyUn̍|vIti̍|asahanta|dEvAḥ|hantA|asu̍rAṇAm|aBavat|śacI̍Biriti̍ śaci# - Biḥ||anAnujAmityanA̍nu̍ - jAm|anujAmityanu-jAm|mAm|akarta|satyam|vada̍ntI|anviti̍|icCE|Etat||BUyAsa̱m|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: RutUṅstanvatE̍ kavayaḥ̍ prajAnatIrmaddhyECandasaḥ̍ pari# yanti BAsvatIḥ||jyOti̍ṣmatI̍ prati# mu~jcatE naBO rAtrI# dEvI sUryasya̍ vratAni|vi̍ paśyanti̍ paśavO jAyamAnA̍ nAnArUpA̍ mAturasyA upasthE̱||EkAṣṭakA tapasA̍ tapyamAnA̍ jajAna garBaM̍ mahimAnamindra̱M|tEna dasyUn vyasahanta̍ dEvA hantA&surAṇA-maBavacCacI̍Biḥ||anA̍nujAmanujAM̍ mAmakarta̍ satyaM ~MvadantyanvicCa̍ Etat|BUyAsa# -[ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam asya|sumatAviti# su - matau|yathA̱|yUyam|anyA|vaḥ|anyAm|atIti|mA|prEti̍|yukta||aBU̱t|mama̍|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|viśvavEdA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|Aṣṭa|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|avidat|hi|gAdham||BUyAsa̱m|asya|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|yathA̱|yUyam|anyA|vaḥ|anyAm|atIti|mA|prEti̍|yukta||pa~jca̍|vyu̍ṣṭIriti̍ vi - uṣṭIḥ|anviti|pa~jca̍|dOhA̱ḥ|gAm|pa~jca̍nAmnImiti̍ pa~jca# - nAmnIm|Rutavaḥ|anviti̍|pa~jca̍||pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśEnEti̍# pa~jca - daśEna|klRuptAḥ|samAnamU̱d^^rdhnIriti̍# samAna - mUd^^rdhnIḥ|aBIti|lOkam|Eka̱m||24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: masya sumatau yathA# yUyamanyA vO# anyAmati mA pra yukta||aBUnmama̍# sumatau viśvavEdA̍ Aṣṭa# pratiṣṭhAmavidaddhi̍ gAdhaM|BUyAsamasya̍ sumatau yathA# yUyamanyA vO# anyAmati mA prayukta||pa~jca̍ vyuṣṭIranu̍ pa~jca dOhA gAM pa~jcanAmnImRutavO&nu̍ pa~jca|pa~jca̍ diśaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśEna# klRuptAḥ samAnamU̱rddhnIraBi̍ lOkamEka̱M||24

verses.padam: - Padam Rutasya|garBa̍ḥ|prathamA|vyUṣuṣIti̍# vi - UṣuṣI̱|apAm|EkA̱|mahimAna̱m|biBarti||sUryasya|EkA̱|cara̍ti|niṣkRutEṣviti̍# niḥ-kRutEṣu|Garmasya̍|EkA̱|savitA|EkA̱m|nIti̍|yacCati||yA|prathamA|vyaucCaditi̍# vi - aucCat|sA|dhEnuḥ|aBavat|yamE||sA|naḥ|paya̍svatI|dhukṣva|utta̍rAmuttarAmityutta̍rAM-uttarAm|samA̱m||śukraṛṣaBEti̍# śukra - RuṣaBA|naBasA|jyOti̍ṣA|Eti̍|agAt|viśvarUpEti̍# viśva - rUpA|śabalIḥ|agnikEturityagni̍ - kEtuḥ||samAnam|artha̱m|svapasyamAnEti# su-apasyamAnA|biBra̍tI|jarAm|ajarE|uṣaḥ|Eti̍|agAḥ||RutUnAm|patnI̱̍ ( )|prathamA|iyam|Eti|agAt|ahnA̱m|nEtrI|janitrI|prajAnAmiti̍# pra - jAnA̱m||EkA̱|satI|bahudhEti# bahu - dhA|uṣaḥ|vIti|ucCasi|ajI̱rṇA|tvam|jarayasi|sarva̱m|anyat||25̍ (69) (UrjamEkA̱ - pratimu~jcamAnA̍ - BUyAsa - mEkaM - patnyE kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: Rutasya garBaḥ̍ prathamA vyUṣuṣyapAmEkA# mahimAnaM̍ biBarti|sUryasyaikA carati̍ niṣkRutEṣu# GarmasyaikA# savitaikAM ni yacCati||yA̍ prathamA̍ vyaucCath sA dhEnuraBavadyamE|sA̍ naḥ payasvatI̍ dhukṣvOttarAmuttarAṃq̍ samA̱M||śukraṛṣaBA̍ naBasA̍ jyOtiṣA &&*gA̱d-viśvarUpA̍ śabalIragnikEtuḥ|samAnamarthaṅ̍# svapasyamAnA̍ biBratI̍ jarAmajara̍ uṣa A&gA̱ḥ||RutUnAM patnI̱ ( ) prathamEyamA&gAdahnA̱M nEtrI janitrI̍ prajAnA̱M|EkA# satI bahudhOṣO̍ vyucCasyajI̱rṇA̍ tvaM jarayasi̍ sarvamanyat||25̍ (UrjamEkA̱ - pratimu~jcamAnA̍ - BUyAsa - mEkaM - patnyE kAnna viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|jAtAn|prEti|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍|pratIti̍|ajA̍tAn|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|nudasva||asmE iti|dIdihi|sumanA̍ iti# su - manA̱ḥ|ahEḍann|tava̍|syAm|śarmann̍|trivarU̍tha̍ iti# tri-varUthaḥ|udBidityu̍t̍ - Bit||sahasA|jAtAn|prEti̍|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍|pratIti̍|ajA̍tAn|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|nudasva||adhIti|naḥ|brUhi|sumanasyamA̍na̍ iti# su - manasyamAnaḥ|vayam|syAma|prEti̍|nuda|naḥ|sapatnAn̍||catuścatvAriṃqśa̍ iti# catuḥ - catvAriṃqśaḥ|stOmaḥ|varca̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|ṣOḍaśaḥ|stOma̍ḥ|Oja̍ḥ|dravi̍ṇam|pRuthivyAḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE# jAtAn praṇudA̍ naḥ sapatnAn pratyajAtA~jjAtavEdO̍ nudasva|asmE dIdihi̍ sumanA ahEḍan̍ tava# syAṃq śarman̍ trivarUtha̍ udBit||sahasA̍ jAtAn praṇudAnaḥ̍ sapatnAn pratyajAtA~jjAtavEdO̍ nudasva|adhi# nO brUhi sumanasyamAnO̍ vayaṅ syAma̍ praṇudA̍ naḥ sapatnAn||catuścatvAriṃqśaḥ̍ stOmO varcO draviṇaṃ̍ ṣOḍaśaḥ stOma OjO draviṇaM̍ pRuthivyAḥ purIṣamasya-̍ [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam aPsaḥ|nAma̍||Eva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|śaBUMriti̍# śaM - BUḥ|Candaḥ|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|Candaḥ|AcCat|Canda̍ḥ|mana̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vyaca̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|sindhu̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|samudram|Canda̍ḥ|salilam|Canda̍ḥ|saM~Myaditi̍# saM - yat|Candaḥ|viyaditi̍# vi - yat|Candaḥ|bRuhat|Canda̍ḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|Candaḥ|nikAya̍ iti# ni - kAyaḥ|Candaḥ|vivadha̍ iti# vi-vadhaḥ|Candaḥ|gira̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|Braja̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|saṣṭubiti̍# sa - stup|Candaḥ|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|kakut|Canda̍ḥ|trikakuditi̍# tri - kakut|Candaḥ|kAvyam|Canda̍ḥ|a~gkupam|Canda̍ḥ|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -PsO nAma|Eva̍ śCandO variva̍ śCandaḥ̍ śaBUM śCandaḥ̍ pariBU śCanda# AcCacCandO mana śCandO vyaca śCandaḥ sindhu śCandaḥ̍ samudraM Candaḥ̍ salilaM Candaḥ̍ saM~MyacCandO# viyacCandO# bRuhacCandO# rathantaraM CandO# nikAya śCandO# vivadha śCandO gira śCandO Braja śCandaḥ̍ saṣṭup CandO# &nuṣṭup Candaḥ̍ kakucCanda# strikakucCandaḥ̍ kAvyaM CandO̱ -&~gkupaM Candaḥ̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam padapa~gktiriti̍# pada - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|akṣara̍pa~gktirityakṣara̍# - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|viṣṭArapa̍~gktiriti̍# viṣṭAra - pa~gktiḥ|Candaḥ|kṣuraḥ|BRujvAn̍|Canda̍ḥ|pracCat|Canda̍ḥ|pakṣaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|Eva̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vari̍vaḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vaya̍ḥ|Canda̍ḥ|vayaskRuditi̍# vayaḥ - kRut|Candaḥ|viśAlamiti̍# vi - śAlam|Candaḥ|viṣpa̍rdhA̍ iti viḥ-spad^^rdhAḥ|Candaḥ|Cadiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|dUrOhaṇamiti̍# dUḥ - rOhaṇam|Candaḥ|tandram|Canda̍ḥ|a~gkA~gkam|Canda̍ḥ||28̍ (33) (asya - ~gkupa~jCanda - strayastriṃśacca)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: padapa~gkti̍ śCandO &kṣarapa~gkti̍ śCandO# viṣṭArapa~gkti̍ śCandaḥ̍ kṣurO BRujvA~jCandaḥ̍ pracCacCandaḥ̍ pakṣa śCanda Eva śCandO variva̍ śCandO vaya śCandO# vayaskRucCandO# viśAlaM CandO viṣparddhA̍ śCanda# śCadi śCandO# dUrOhaṇaM CandastandraM̍ CandO̱ &~gkA~gkaM Candaḥ||28̍ (asya - ~gkupa~jCanda - strayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agniḥ|vRutrAṇi|ja~gGanat|draviṇasyuḥ|vipanyayEti̍# vi - panyayA̱||samiddha̍ iti# sam - iddhaḥ|śukraḥ|Ahuta̍ ityA - hutaḥ||tvam|sOma|asi|satpatiriti̍ sat - patiḥ|tvam|rAjA̱|uta|vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA||tvam|Badraḥ|asi|kratuḥ||BadrA|tE|agnE|svanIkEti̍# su - anIka|sandRugEti# saM - dRuk|GOrasya|sataḥ|viṣu̍ṇasya|cAru̍ḥ||na|yat|tE|śOciḥ|tama̍sA|vara̍nta|na|dhvasmAna̍ḥ|tanuvi̍|rEpa̍ḥ|Eti̍|dhuḥ||Badram|tE|agnE|sahasinn|anI̍kam|upAkE|Eti̍|rOcatE|sUrya̍sya||29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnirvRutrAṇi# ja~gGanad draviṇasyurvipanyayA̱|sami̍ddhaḥ̍ śukra Ahutaḥ||tvaṃ̍ sOmAsi̍ satpatistvaṃ̍ rAjOta vRutrahA|tvaM̍ BadrO asi̍ kratuḥ||BadrA̍ tE# agnE svanIka sadRuMgGOrasya# satO viṣuṇasya̍ cAruḥ|na̍ yat tE# śOcistamasA̍ varanta̍ na dhvasmAnastanuvi̍ rEpa A dhuḥ||BadraM̍ tE# agnE sahasinnanIkamupAka̍ A rOcatE̍ sUryasya|29̍

verses.padam: - Padam ruśat|dRuśE|dadRuśE|naktayA|cit|arU̱kṣitam|dRuśE|Eti̍|rUpE|anna̱m||saḥ|EnA|anI̍kEna|suvidatra̍ iti# su-vidatraḥ|asmE̍ iti|yaṣṭA̱|dEvAn|Aya̍jiṣṭha̍ ityA - yajiṣṭhaḥ|svasti||adabdhaḥ|gOpA̍ iti gO-pAḥ|uta|naḥ|paraspA iti# paraḥ-pAḥ|agnE̱|dyumaditi# dyu - mat|uta|rEvat|didIhi||svasti|naḥ|divaḥ|agnE|pRuthivyAḥ|viśvAyuriti# viśva - Ayuḥ|dhEhi|yajathAya|dEva||yat|sImahi̍|divijAtEti̍# divi - jAta|praśastamiti̍ pra - śastam|tat|asmAsu|dravi̍ṇam|dhEhi|citram||yathA̱|hOtaḥ|manu̍ṣaḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ruśad-dRuśE̍ dadRuśE̍ naktayA cidarU̱kṣitaM dRuśa A rUpE anna̱M||sainA&nIkEna̍ suvidatrO# asmE yaṣṭA# dEvAṃ Ayajiṣṭhaḥ̍ svasti|adabdhO̍ gOpA uta naḥ̍ paraspA agnE̱ dyumaduta rEvad didIhi||svasti̍ nO# divO agnE̍ pRuthivyA viśvAyurddhEhi̍ yajathAya̍ dEva|yath sImahi# divijAta praśastaM̍ tadasmAsu draviṇaM̍ dhEhi citraM||yathA# hOtarmanuṣO̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam dEvatAtEti# dEva - tAtA|yajñEBiḥ|sUnO̍ iti|sahasaḥ|yajA̍si||EvA|naḥ|adya|samanA|samAnAn|uśann|agnE|uśataḥ|yakṣi|dEvAn||agnim|IḍE|purOhi̍tamiti̍# puraḥ - hitam|yajñasya|dEvam|Rutvija̱m||hOtA̍ram|ratnadhAta̍mamiti̍# ratna - dhAtamam||vRuṣA̱|sOma|dyumAniti̍# dyu-mAn|asi|vRuṣA̱|dEva|vRuṣavrata̍ iti vRuṣa# - vrataḥ||vRuṣA̱|dharmAṇi|dadhiṣE||sAnta̍panA̍ iti sAM - tapanAḥ|idam|haviḥ|marutaḥ|tat|jujuṣṭana||yuṣmAka̍|UtI|riśAdasa̍ iti# riśa - adasaḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|martaḥ|vasavaḥ|durqḥRuṇAyuriti̍# duḥ - hRuṇAyuḥ|tiraḥ|satyAni|marutaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvatAtA̍ yajñEBiḥ̍ sUnO sahasO yajAsi|EvA̍ nO# adya samanA̍ samAnAnu-śanna̍gna̍ uśatO yakṣi̍ dEvAn||agnimIḍE̍ purOhitaM̍ ~Myajñasya# dEvamRutvija̱M|hOtAraṃ̍ ratnadhAtamaM||vRuṣA̍# sOma dyumAṃ asi̍ vRuṣA# dEva vRuṣavrataḥ|vRuṣA̍ dharmAṇi̍ dadhiṣE||sAntapanA̍ idaṃ havirmarutastajju̍juṣṭana|yuṣmAkOtI̍ riśAdasaḥ||yO̍ nO martO# vasavO duṛhRuṇAyustiraḥ satyAni# marutO - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam jiGAṃsAt||druhaḥ|pAśa̱m|pratIti̍|saḥ|mucIṣṭa|tapi̍ṣṭhEna|tapa̍sA|hantana|tam||saM~MvathsarIṇA̍ iti# saM - vathsarIṇA̱ḥ|marutaḥ|svarkA̍ iti# su - arkAḥ|urukṣayA ityuru̍ - kṣayA̱ḥ|sagaṇA̍ iti sa - gaṇAḥ|mAnuṣEṣu||tE|asmat|pAśAn̍|prEti̍|mu~jcantu|aṃha̍saḥ|sAntapanA̍ iti# sAM - tapanAḥ|madirAḥ|mAdayiṣṇavaḥ||piprIhi|dEvAn|uśataḥ|yaviṣṭha|vidvAn|RutUn|Rutupata̍ ityRutu-patE|yaja|iha||yE|daivyA̱ḥ|Rutvija̍ḥ|tEBi̍ḥ|agnE|tvam|hOtRU̍ṇAm|asi|Aya̍jiṣṭha̍ ityA - yajiṣṭhaḥ||agnE̱|yat|adya|viśaḥ|addhvarasya|hOtaḥ|pAvaka|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jiGAṃsAt|druhaḥ̍ pAśaM prati sa mucIṣṭa̍ tapiṣṭhEna̍ tapasA̍ hantanA taM||saM~MvathsarIṇA# marutaḥ̍ svarkA urukṣayAḥ̍ sagaṇA̍ mAnuṣEṣu|tE̱&smat̍ pAśAn pra mu~jcantvaṃha̍saḥ̍ sAntapanA madirA̍ mAdayiṣṇava̍ḥ||piprIhi̍ dEvAṃ uśatO̍ yaviṣṭha̍ vidvAṃ RutUṃṛRutupatE̍ yajEha|yE daivyA# RutvijastEBiragnE̍ tvaṃ hOtRUṇAmasyAya̍jiṣṭhaḥ||agnE̍ yadadya viśO addhvarasya̍ hOtaḥ pAvaka̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam śOcE|vEḥ|tvam|hi|yajvA̱||RutA|yajAsi|mahinA|vIti|yat|BUḥ|havyA|vaha|yaviṣṭha|yA|tE|adya||agninA̱|rayim|aśnavat|pOṣa̱m|Eva|divEdi̍va̍ iti# divE - divE||yaśasa̱m|vIravattamamiti̍# vIravat̍ - tamam||gayasPAna iti# gaya - sPAnaḥ|amIvahEtya̍mIva̍ - hA|vasuviditi# vasu - vit|puṣṭivad^^rdhana̍ iti# puṣṭi - vardhanaḥ||sumitra̍ iti# su - mitraḥ|sOma|naḥ|Bava||gRuhamEdhAsa̍ iti gRuha# - mEdhAsaḥ|Eti|gata|maru̍taḥ|mA|apEti̍|BUtana||pramu~jcanta̍ iti# pra - mu~jcantaḥ|naḥ|aṃha̍saḥ||pUrvIBi̍ḥ|hi|dadAśima|śaradBiriti̍# śarat - Biḥ|marutaḥ|vayam||mahOBiriti̍ mahaḥ̍ - Biḥ|33 (50)
verses.samhita: śOcE vEṣṭvaṃ hi yajvA̱|RutA yajAsi̍ mahinA vi yadBUṛhavyA vaha̍ yaviṣṭha yA tE# adya||agninA# rayimaśnavat̍ pOṣamEva̍ divEdivE|yaśasa̍M̍ ~MvIravattamaM||gayasPAnO̍# amIvahA vasuvit̍ puṣṭivarddha̍naḥ|sumitraḥ̍ sOma̍ nO Bava||gRuhamEdhAsa̍ A gata̍ marutO̍ mA&pa# BUtana|pramu~jcantO# nO aṃhasaḥ||pUrvIBirqḥi̍ dadAśima̍ śaradBirmarutO̍ vayaM|mahOBi-̍ [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam carq.ṣaṇInAm||prEti|buddhniyA̱|IratE|vaḥ|mahAṃ̍si|prEti̍|nAmA̍ni|prayajyava̍ iti# pra - yajyavaḥ|tiraddhvam||sahasriya̱m|damya̱m|BAgam|Etam|gRuhamEdhIyamiti# gRuha - mEdhIya̱m|marutaḥ|juṣaddhvam||upEti|yam|Eti̍|yuvatiḥ|sudakṣamiti̍# su-dakṣa̱m|dOṣA|vastO̱ḥ|haviṣmatI|GRutAcI̱||upEti̍|sva|Enam|arama̍tiḥ|vasUyuriti̍# vasU - yuḥ||imO iti|agnE|vItata̍mAnIti̍# vIta - tamAni|havyA|ajasraḥ|vakṣi|dEvatA̍timiti̍# dEva - tAtim|acCa||pratIti̍|naḥ|Im|suraBIṇi̍|viyantu||krIḍam|vaḥ|śad^^rdha̍ḥ|mAru̍tam|anarvAṇa̱m|rathEśuBamiti̍# rathE - śuBa̱m||34 (50)
verses.samhita: -ścaṛṣaṇInAM||prabuddhniyA# IratE vO mahAṃsi̍ praṇAmAni̍ prayajyavastiraddhvaM|sahasriyaM damyaM̍ BAgamEtaM gRuhamEdhIya̍M̍ marutO juṣaddhvaM||upa yamEti# yuvatiḥ sudakṣaM̍ dOṣA vastOr.̍ haviṣmatI̍ GRutAcI̱|upa svainamarama̍tirva-sUyuḥ||imO̍ agnE̍ vItatamAni̍ havyA &jasrO̍ vakṣi dEvatAtimacCa̍|prati̍# na Iṃ suraBIṇi# viyantu||krIḍaM ~Mvaḥ śarddhO mArutamanarvAṇaṃ̍# rathEśuBa̱M|34

verses.padam: - Padam kaṇvA̱ḥ|aBi|prEti|gAyata||atyA̍saḥ|na|yE|maruta̍ḥ|sva~jca̍ḥ|yakṣadRuśa̍ iti# yakṣa - dRuśaḥ|na|śuBaya̍nta|maryA̱ḥ||tE|harmyEṣṭhA̍ iti# harmyE-sthAḥ|śiśavaḥ|na|śuBrAḥ|vathsAsa̍ḥ|na|prakrIḍina̍ iti# pra - krIḍinaḥ|payOdhA̍ iti# payaḥ - dhAḥ||prEti|EṣAm|ajmE̍ṣu|vithurA|iva|rEjatE|BUmi̍ḥ|yAmE̍ṣu|yat|ha|yu~jjatE̱|śuBE||tE|krIḍaya̍ḥ|dhuna̍yaḥ|BrAja̍dRuṣṭaya̍ iti BrAjat̍ - Ruṣṭayaḥ|svayam|mahitvamiti# mahi - tvam|panayanta|dhUtayaḥ||upahvarEṣvityu̍pa-hvarEṣu̍|yat|aci̍ddhvam|yayim|vaya̍ḥ|iva|marutaḥ|kEna̍|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kaṇvA# aBi pra gAyata||atyA̍sO̍ na yE marutaḥ sva~jcO# yakṣadRuśO na śuBayanta̍ maryA̱ḥ|tE harmyEṣṭhAḥ̍ śiśavO̍ na śuBrA vathsAsO na prakrIḍina̍ḥ̍ payOdhAḥ||praiṣAmajmEṣu̍ vithurEva# rEjatE BUmiryAmEṣu̍ yaddha# yu~jjatE# śuBE|tE krIḍayO dhunayO̍ BrAjadRuṣṭayaḥ̍ svayaM mahitvaM̍ panayanta̍ dhUtayaḥ||upahvarEṣu̍ yadaciddhvaM̍ ~MyayiM ~Mvaya# iva marutaḥ kEna# - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam cit|pathA||ścOtanti|kOśA̱ḥ|upEti̍|vaḥ|rathE̍ṣu|Eti̍|GRutam|ukṣata|madhu̍varṇamiti̍ madhu# - varṇam|arcatE||agnima̍gnimityagnim̍ - agnim|havImaBiriti̍ havIma̍ - Biḥ|sadA̱|havanta|viśpati̱m||havyavAhamiti# havya - vAha̱m|purupriyamiti# puru - priyam||tam|hi|śaśvantaḥ|Iḍa̍tE|srucA|dEvam|GRutaścutEti̍# GRuta - ścutA̱||agnim|havyAya|vOḍha̍vE||indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|rOcanA|divaḥ|śnathat|vRutram|indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ|viśva̍karmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|haviṣA̱|vAvRudhAnaḥ|viśvakarmanniti̍ viśva# - karmann|haviṣA̱|vad^^rdhanEna||36̍ (46) (sUryasya̍ - manuṣO̍ - marutaḥ - pAvaka̍ - mahOBI̍ - rathEśuBa - ~gkEna - ṣaḍcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A13) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 13 Anuvaakams :- (apAntvEma# - nnayaM purO Buvaḥ - prAcI̱ - dhruvakṣiti̍ - stryavi - rindrA̱gnI - mA Canda# - AśustrivRu - dagnErBAgO̱ - &syEka# - yEyamEva sA yA - &gnE# jAtA - nagnirvRutrAṇi - trayOdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (apAntvE - ndrA̱gnI - iyamEva - dEvatAtA̍ - ṣaṭtriṃśat̍ ) First and Last Padam of ṭhird Prasnam of Kandam 4 :- (apAntvEman̍ - haviṣA vardhanEna)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE caturtha kAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||-----------------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA# vAvRudhAnO>5, viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA vardhanEna̍ > 6 viśvakarman.̍ haviṣA# vAvRudhAnaḥ svayaM ~Myajasva̍ tanuvaM̍ juṣAṇaḥ|muhyantvanyE̍ aBitaḥ̍ sapatnA# ihAsmAkaM̍ maGavA# sUrirastu||viśva̍karman.̍ haviṣA vardhanEna̍ trAtAramindramakRuṇOravadhyaM|tasmai̍ viśaḥ samanamanta̍ pUrvIrayamugrO vihavyO̍# yathAsat||̍
